MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:05am to safely replace faulty equipment on Laighstonhall Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:05pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48am on Wednesday, 10 March 2021
